Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Amulet
Description: Amulet in the shape of a cartouche topped with the solar disc and two feathers. Inside the cartouche, three superimposed hieroglyphic signs in relief form the name Neferkare (Shabako). The reverse of the amulet is flat. There are two suspension holes pierced across the amulet , at the base of the feathers and at the bottom of the cartouche.
